<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>MPARGUMENTS</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>MPeff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds weapon item, including magazine, directly to the [[primaryWeapon]]. This is used for infantry weapons.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''addPrimaryWeaponItem''' item </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] or [[Boolean]] - '''false''' is returned if '''item''' can not be added </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>player [[addPrimaryWeaponItem]] "muzzle_snds_H";
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[addWeaponItem]], [[removePrimaryWeaponItem]], [[removeAllPrimaryWeaponItems]], [[addSecondaryWeaponItem]], [[addHandgunItem]], [[addBinocularItem]], [[weaponsItems]], [[handgunItems]], [[primaryWeaponItems]], [[secondaryWeaponItems]], [[binocularItems]]   </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 22, 2014 - 23:08 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:SilentSpike|SilentSpike]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
If the item being added is not supported by the unit's weapon then the command will simply fail silently. The item is also '''not''' added to the unit's inventory in such a case.
</dd>
